dt: {bc}a group united by common traits or interests {bc}{sx|category||}

dt.t: what {wi}kind{/wi} of car do you drive

dt: {bc}a doubtful or barely admissible member of a category

dt.t: a difference in degree but not in {wi}kind{/wi}

dt: {bc}the equivalent of what has been offered or received

dt.t: promised to return the favor in {wi}kind{/wi}

pt: {sc}type{/sc} {sc}kind{/sc} {sc}sort{/sc} {sc}nature{/sc} {sc}description{/sc} {sc}character{/sc} mean a number of individuals thought of as a group because of a common quality or qualities. {sc}type{/sc} may suggest strong and clearly marked similarity throughout the items included so that each is typical of the group.

pt.t: a zoo seemingly having animals of every {it}kind{/it}
the {it}sort{/it} of newspaper dealing in sensational stories

pt: {sc}nature{/sc} may imply inherent, essential resemblance rather than obvious or superficial likenesses.
{sc}description{/sc} implies a group marked by agreement in all details belonging to a type as described or defined.

pt.t: not all acts of that {it}description{/it} are actually illegal

pt: {sc}character{/sc} implies a group marked by distinctive likenesses peculiar to the type.

pt.t: research on the subject so far has been of an elementary {it}character{/it}

et: Middle English {it}kinde{/it}, from Old English {it}cynd{/it}; akin to Old English {it}cynn{/it} kin
shortdef: a group united by common traits or interests : category
a doubtful or barely admissible member of a category

dt: {bc}arising from or characterized by sympathy or forbearance
{bc}of a kind to give pleasure or relief

shortdef: of a sympathetic or helpful nature
arising from or characterized by sympathy or forbearance

dt: {bc}in a way that approximates {bc}{sx|more or less||}

shortdef: in a way that approximates : more or less

shortdef: four cards of the same rank plus a wild card in one hand

dt: {bc}consisting of something (such as goods or commodities) other than money

shortdef: consisting of something (such as goods or commodities) other than money

dt: {bc}three cards of the same rank in one hand {dx}see {dxt|poker|poker|illustration}{/dx}

shortdef: three cards of the same rank in one hand

dt.t: Would you {it}be kind enough{/it} to show me the way?
Would you {it}be so kind{/it} as to show me the way?

dt: {bc}not at all like the thing mentioned {bc}nothing like the thing mentioned

dt.t: "He's really pretty arrogant, isn't he?" "No! He's {it}nothing of the kind{/it}. He's a very friendly and helpful man."
This technology is completely new. {it}Nothing of the kind{/it} has ever been seen before.

shortdef: not at all like the thing mentioned : nothing like the thing mentioned
